short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically replaces all links to biased news sites with archive links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop clicking fake/biased news.
Stop rewarding fake/biased news sites with ad revenue.

This extension will replace all links to them with archive links.
